title: Dangerous Woman (song)
summary: "Dangerous Woman" is a song recorded by American singer Ariana Grande, serving as the lead single from her third studio album of the same name.[2] It was written by Johan Carlsson, Ross Golan, and Max Martin, produced by Martin and Carlsson. The track was released as the first single from the album on March 11, 2016, the same date of the album's pre-order on iTunes Store. "Dangerous Woman" is a mid-tempo pop and R&B song.
